mutants.code:
def count_exclusive_subscriptions(english_subscribers, french_subscribers):
    """
    Counts the number of students who have subscribed to either the English or the French newspaper but not both.

    Parameters:
    english_subscribers (set): A set of integers representing the roll numbers of students who have subscribed to the English newspaper.
    french_subscribers (set): A set of integers representing the roll numbers of students who have subscribed to the French newspaper.

    Returns:
    int: The total number of students who have subscriptions to the English or the French newspaper but not both.
    """
    return len(english_subscribers | french_subscribers)
